website_summaries.verdict: This set would be good for a smaller yard or play space.
pros: Clubhouse area at ground level, which works well for smaller kids
Two swings and a trapeze bar
Includes a crow's nest area and a 10-foot slide
cons: This set has fewer total play stations than most other Backyard Discovery sets

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero stars if I could. Pieces are missing, holes are not drilled properly, and the screw holding the swings are already starting to turn from the beam and my kids are only 40 pounds each. So mad I got this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Underhill

customer_reviews.title: Great set for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled today, took 2 adults 7 hours to get it completed, there were a few minor flaws in the set, holes drilled incorrectly in several spots. Our son absolutely loved it from the word go. Please be sure you have power tools and patience as assembling one of these is not for the quick to quit types. We used our own fitst step brand toddler swing in lieu of the short chain swinging yellow bars.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Booth

customer_reviews.title: the instructions were fairly easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: The play set looks exactly as portrayed on box. Delivered in two flat heavy boxes. Instructions not included, but a 79 page document was available online that also included the warranty. After removing all of the parts from the boxes and sorting them alphabetically, it then took my husband about 10 hours to put it together. Also, a second person is definitely needed to assemble the slide. End result: the instructions were fairly easy to follow, it is sturdy, and the materials are good quality. Our granddaughter is loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Time Consuming, but nice end result
customer_reviews.text: This entire set comes in 2 boxes. It is completely knocked down to each little slat. It took 3 people 9 hours to assemble. That being said we are happy with the end result and our kiddo loves it already. My biggest complaint is that someone had written on a couple of the pieces with pen to do simple math... Seriously? You couldn't find a piece of paper?
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The set is as described. We liked that it was fairly easy to put together, with only a couple steps that were confusing. What we didn't like: It has been five days now and one of the bars on the balcony has already split and some steps in the directions were a little confusing. Overall good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LopezFam

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: Very nice playset, my kids love it. The directions are very easy to follow, not everything was clearly marked but once you start putting it together it wasn't difficult to figure out. The wood is softer then I would like but all in all it's a great set.
customer_reviews.author: megan koslop

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else!
customer_reviews.text: We regret buying this. It comes in a bizillion pieces and takes FOREVER to assemble. Some of the boards are warped. The directions are wrong, and sent me on a wild goose chase to the hardware store for hardware that we thought was missing, but ended up just being mislabeled. After all that, I don't really trust that it'll hold the weight of my 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Gardenour

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Wood pieces are weak, pealing and already splitting (just installed 2 days ago). I had to reinforce several pieces with additional lumber from Home Depot and I’m still skeptical about this set staying together while my 5 year old and 3 year old play on it. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read instructions for easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 year old. I had one person help me assemble it and we got it done in just a few hours. It was much easier than I thought it would be! My son loves it and was very surprised when he saw his new playset! And there is plenty of room on the lookout/balcony to add on a steering wheel and telescope!
customer_reviews.author: momma_cass

customer_reviews.title: Molding wood
customer_reviews.text: Swing has been together less than a month and is molding !?! We were under the impression this was treated wood but obviously it isn’t. Also many of the boards had to be cut to fit right. The mold Is most definitely a concern ...as you can see by the add it shows mold resistant, as you can see from my pictures it’s definitely not..
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Spent hours putting together and 1 bag of 4 bolts missing so can’t finish it. Missing bag is 4-G-bolt WH 5/16x1 1/4 - h100009 Guess I gotta go to Home Depot 😡
customer_reviews.author: Mary Harte

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had this about a month and the veneer has ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this about a month and the veneer has started peeling and the wood has started to crack
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent playset and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around for several weeks before I found this playset for my grandsons. the price was excellent and when it arrived I was even more impressed. Good material, sturdy and holds up well. I can't believe it was 200 dollars less than other place I looked. And my grandsons love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Look wise, the swing set is great. Material wise, the one is too cheap. The crack easily. The creeand moan all the time and honestly I don’t think the swing set itself will last more than roughly two years.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I thought the cross members would be built of larger ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought the cross members would be built of larger material. I am going to rebuild it with actual 2x4's for cross members, and 4x4's for the verticals.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wood is pretty bad quality. Splits in a few spots. And the pic is of top step. Not even a wk old and its falling apart. It's been sealed since day #2.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Abdallah

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money
customer_reviews.text: Wood is thin and cheap. Several boards split while putting in bolts and screws. Several holes were in the wrong places. Extremely dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some parts were broken inside, the handyman I hired had to improvise
customer_reviews.author: Delphine

customer_reviews.title: Great playground!
customer_reviews.text: Took a LONG time to assemble but my son loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Daffin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful swing set at a great price! This like any other set does take patience and time to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Perry

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Several cracked boards. Some screw holes were way off. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and the kids really enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were about 90% accurate, not too hard to follow. It did take quite a while to put together. It's sturdy and the kids really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The wood is very very cheap and split on us twice during setup. The slide seems very sketchy. I wish I would have just sent it back. Big mistake
customer_reviews.author: CAROLINE

customer_reviews.title: TBD
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is as advertised. Hope it holds up to the elements. Could of been a little more pre assembled to help out the buyer. Also needs to b sealed w water seal yearly.
customer_reviews.author: angelo

customer_reviews.title: Good, but difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The parts of the playset shipped quicker than expected and arrived in great shape! However it was really pretty difficult to assemble. The directions are hard to follow at times and definitely require multiple adults and a lot of time to assemble. The end product is good, not sturdy enough for older kids, but great for kids under 6! Our son is loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Archuleta

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Pay attention to the details
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old loves the playhouse. Assembly was time consuming, but if you pay attention to the small details (screw vs lag vs bolt) and the orientation of the boards, then it is well spelled out in the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Hester

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it. Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it. Very nice quality. True what they say. It will take 2 people to put it together and it will take 8 hours to put together. Only one thing that we had an issue with. We were short a couple bolts. Had to send my daughter in law to the hardware store to match up the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna Hennessey

customer_reviews.title: There is a board that needs the corners cut off ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a board that needs the corners cut off my little one fell on it and hurt his chest.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap thin wood. Spend your money on something else. I don't think it will hold up long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Backyard Discovery Peninsula All Cedar Wood Playset Swing Set
product_meta.description: The Peninsula Cedar Wood Swing Set is brilliantly designed to provide hours of play and enjoyment while taking up less space. The 4' main deck with an elevated crows nest overlooks the picnic table. The framed tower roof provides the swing set with a fantastic blue and yellow theme. Also included is an 8' Speedy Slide, (2) Belt Swings, an Acrobat Bar and a 4' Rockwall Ladder. A lower cabin incorporates a serving station with a bench as well as a working ½ door. The Peninsula Swing Set will keep the kids using their imaginations all day long
feature_bullets: A backyard playset including a playdeck with 2 belt swings, a trapeze swing and a slide
A canopy swing set, with colorful blue and yellow striped canopies over the compact upper deck, as well as a crow's nest
Make this your diy swing set with a lower play area with a wooden kids clubhouse, with a working half door, serving station and bench
Two standard belt swing set swings and a swing trapeze bar. An 8 foot playground slide - super safe but speedy
A rock climbing wall ladder included with the wood swing set plans

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars38 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Manufacturer: Backyard Discovery- Leisure Time Products, Inc. - Dropship
